definition: to keep quiet out of fear (idiom)
unable to speak/silent
to seem/like/as/if
cold/poor/to tremble
cicada

sentences.english: In face of autocratic and political pressure, we will not be silent.
sentences.chinese: 面對強權和專制的各方壓力，我們不會噤若寒蟬。

sentences.english: Although nurses carefully after the family member, still kept silent.
sentences.chinese: 雖經家人細心看護，仍噤若寒蟬。

sentences.english: The woman driver naturally shouted for help.
sentences.chinese: 女司機情急呼救，全車乘客噤若寒蟬。

definition: to act in collusion (idiom); in cahoots with/villains will look after one another
no way out/nowhere to go/trapped beyond hope of rescue/painted into a corner
to prevail upon/to coax
to stir up public sentiment by false statements (idiom)/to resort to demagogy
to speak face to face/meeting/interview
henchmen
law and order/rules and discipline
to mention sth without elaborating (idiom); not giving details
see 臨陣退縮|临阵退缩[lin2 zhen4 tui4 suo1]
conclusion/judgment/verdict
to frame sb (by planting sth on them)
Iron Curtain (1945-1991) (in Taiwan, 鐵幕 was used to refer to both the Iron Curtain and the Bamboo Curtain)
scramble for power and profit (idiom); power struggle
to cut weeds and eliminate the roots (idiom); to destroy root and branch/to eliminate completely
to admonish
to condemn in speech and in writing (idiom)/to denounce by word and pen
